message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the time pressure on your side.
I understand the time pressure, but that offer significantly undervalues my position. Let's find a fairer middle ground.
I appreciate finding a middle ground, but the deal needs to be even to be fair considering the declining value of the money for you.
I'm willing to meet closer to the middle, but the declining value needs to be factored in. This offer reflects a pragmatic compromise.
Bob, we're getting close. This offer is a slight concession on my part, recognizing the time pressure. Let's close this deal.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer - it's a slight edge to me reflecting the time pressure, but avoids us both losing out entirely.
